игра топ , но мы с другом почувствовали себя тупыми
I played this so much when i was younger

definetely recommend buying the valve complete pack (on sale as of writing this review), you get all of the portals and other valve games. very fun with friends when playing custom workshop coop campaigns.
I like that the puzzles have some physics involved. The puzzles also make you use your brain.
Mir ist aufgefallen das Valve Kann nicht bis 3 Zählen.

No mms, que hermoso juegazo, la ptmdr, intenso, increíble, buenos desafíos y puzzles, juego de cultura señores, valve chad, no se por que no lo jugué en sus años de gloria, pero compralo, no te arrepentirás, pero juega el primero juego de preferencia. 99 de 100, el 1 que le quité fue por que Wealthy me caia bien pero que mr tan desgraciado! Eras mi amigo k4br0n!! Te di mi amistad y me escupiste en la cara! AAAAAAAAAAAAA
Es muy diferente a todo lo que he jugado en todos los años que he vivido.

Portal and it's sequel are excellent staple puzzle games, and the ability to remote play together really puts this up into the level of staple, required games in my opinion (especially as it is frequently very cheap).
this was super fun to play with a friend! just pick a partner that you're able to deal with when things get frustrating lol
Обожаю когда всю игру меня обзывают жирухой и заставляют проходить испытания,а потом резко переобуваются и отпускают меня на волю.
jogo de quebrar a cabeça mas é legal
Игра отличная, по прохождению вышло почти 8 часов. Советую к употреблению !

This is a great game if your into puzzles and all sorts of confusing things! This gets the mind working while telling the story behind the portal. All sorts of fun things to do while following around the audio tapes.
had an argument with a power mad british man and killed him with the help of a potato
Hala bitmedi ancak serinin harika bir devam oyunu.
me encanta cuando se convierte en un first person patata

10/10

This game stands the test of time. Even after 11 years its just as good as I remembered.
Мне достаточно уже чёрного юмора от Гладос.
Muy entretenido si te gustan los puzzles. Conforme avanza el juego iran apareciendo nuevos elementos con los que debes de interactuar para pasar los niveles.
Я не люблю картошку, прости меня ГЛАДОС
этому есть научное объяснение, почему тебя мать решила оставить после твоего рождения
One of the best games out there, you will fall in love with the story! I loved portal 1 and ofc I got 2! The co-op mode is worth it! HUGE RECOMMEND!
portal is cool and trippy, would recommend
Very good puzzle game. Fun to play with family and friends (minus the family and friends)
Очень интересная игра, особо для игры с друзьями.

Really fun game, some of stages are hard but fun to solve. I suggest you to play it.
1 of the best games ive played

This game is very fun but some of the stages of the game legit fry your brain. Its quite hard puzzle game but the graphics and the story is one of the best. I would give it 8/10.

Nice game. Good mechanics, good puzzles, good story. Nothing that hasn't been said before.
